00020 #define     DB_BITS_FOR_LIBRARY                                         10
00021 #define     DB_BITS_FOR_FILE_ID                                         22
00022 
00023 #define     DB_EXTRACT_LIBRARY( exp )                       ( exp >> DB_BITS_FOR_FILE_ID )
00024 #define     DB_EXTRACT_FILE_ID( exp )                       ( exp & 0x3FFFFF )
00025 
00026 #define DB_ADD_LIBRARY_ID( exp )                      ( exp << DB_BITS_FOR_FILE_ID )
00027 #define DB_ADD_FILE_ID( exp )                               ( exp & 0xC00000 )
